item.title: HTB Cap Walkthrough
item.description: Box Info Attribute Details Level Easy OS Linux Box URL https://app.hackthebox.com/machines/Cap Box Status Retired About Box Cap is an easy difficulty Linux machine running an HTTP server that performs administrative functions, including performing network captures. Improper controls result in Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR), giving access to another user’s capture. The capture contains plaintext credentials and can be used to gain foothold. A Linux capability is then leveraged to escalate to root.

item.title: BHAVIK KANEJIYA
item.description: ✉️ Email: bhavikkanejiya@gmail.com | 🔗 LinkedIn 🔐 PENETRATION TESTER 🛠️ Penetration Testing | 🔍 Vulnerability Assessment | 🛡️ Network Security Highly motivated and skilled penetration tester with 1.5 years of experience in identifying and exploiting vulnerabilities across Web applications, APIs, Android, iOS, Kubernetes, and Cloud environments. Proven ability to work independently and collaboratively to deliver comprehensive security assessments, contributing to improved security posture and reduced risk of cyberattacks. 💼 WORK EXPERIENCE 🏢 KPMG Assurance and Consulting Services LLP - Bangalore, Karnataka 🔒 Security Analyst

item.title: whoami 🧑🏻‍💻
item.description: 👋 Hey there, I’m Bhavik Kanejiya! Welcome to my corner of the internet! I’m a Security Consultant with a passion for pentesting and the dynamic world of cybersecurity. 🛡️ With over 1.5 years of experience, I’ve honed my skills across multiple domains like Android, iOS, Web, API, Docker, Kubernetes, and more. I love taking on challenges, whether it’s a network VAPT game 🎮 or exploring reverse engineering techniques. 💼 Professional Journey Currently, I’m working at a Big 4 firm, where I focus on conducting various security assessments and penetration tests.

item.title: Let’s do a peek inside the admin dashboard - Abuse API endpoint
item.description: There is broken access control in the API which helps an employee to become the admin of a workspace but with limited permissions. Application introduction It’s a productivity app that has over 2 million+ users and is used by business to track employee project time and expenses. Key Features There are many features, but these are some of the most important ones: User can join multiple workspaces User can create their own workspace The admin of a workspace can invite other user by email How does the application work?
